text: Mario Kart World is an upcoming kart racing game made by Nintendo. It will be released on June 5, 2025, the same day the Nintendo Switch 2 comes out. This game adds new features to Mario Kart, such as an open world game mode. == Gameplay == Mario Kart World is a game about racing in karts as characters from Mario games. The game has 40 characters to play as, and races now have 24 characters racing at the same time. == Other websites == * Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Open-world video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games
title: Mario Kart World
